name: Plastic Reef
description:
!!If controls don't work - reload the page and try again. It should work after that!!

Plastic Reef is an arcade game about water pollution.

It was made for the SEAJAM game jam in November 2021.

I made all art, music, and did all the programming. The only part that wasn't was some help from friends at coming up with a name (i suck at that)

You can use A and D or the arrow keys to control the game.
